alert.note: Alert for Adams; Grant; Hettinger; Morton; Sioux; Stark (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 04 at 1:31AM CDT until July 04 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 AM CDT/1245 AM MDT/ FOR SOUTHWESTERN SIOUX...EASTERN HETTINGER... NORTHWESTERN MORTON...EASTERN STARK...WESTERN GRANT AND SOUTHEASTERN ADAMS COUNTIES... At 131 AM CDT/1231 AM MDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles northeast of Hebron to 5 miles southeast of Elgin to near Lemmon, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Glen Ullin, Elgin, Hebron, Richardton, Carson, New Leipzig, Taylor, Heart Butte Dam, North Lemmon, Burt, Leith, Heil and Bentley. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Grant; Hettinger; Morton; Sioux; Stark
